content: I don't have any dietary restrictions, but I'm actually curious about cooking Japanese dishes myself. I posted a few recipes in the "Foodie Fanatics" group, and people were really helpful with feedback and suggestions. I also asked for recommendations in the "Travel Enthusiasts" group, and that's how I got the tip for the ramen place in Osaka. By the way, I also joined another Facebook group recently, "Book Club", which I stumbled upon while browsing through Facebook's group suggestions.
